hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
(git branch -a | grep ${branch}) || (git tag -l | grep ${branch})
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
git checkout $branch && echo "#Sucess: source codes had checkout to ${branch} branch" || { echo "#Error: source codes failed to checkout to ${branch} branch"; exit ; }
else
echo "#Error: source codes ${branch} branch does not exist！"; exit ;
fi
log=`git log|grep 'commit'|head -1`
version=`echo ${log##*commit}`
slug=%s
path=%s
binIp=%s
name=$slug-${branch}-$version
echo "versionStart="$version"=versionEnd"
%s
default=`ls __PACKAGE__*`
ts=`date '+%%Y-%%m-%%d-%%H-%%M-%%S'`
newName=$name-$ts`echo ${default##__PACKAGE__}`
mv __PACKAGE__* $newName
tar -zcvf $newName.tar.gz $newName*
ansible $binIp -u root -m shell -a "if [ ! -d "/opt/apps/$path" ];then mkdir -p /opt/apps/$path;fi"
rsync -v $newName.tar.gz root@$binIp:/packages/$path/
echo "jarNameStart="$newName"=jarNameEnd"
echo "tarNameStart="$newName.tar.gz"=tarNameEnd"
